official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to further restrict the interception of certain wire or oral communications.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to add to the current conditions under which it is lawful for a person acting, or not acting, under color of law to intercept a wire or oral communication: (1) the consent of all parties to the communication to such interception; or (2) reasonable belief of the interceptor that the communication violates the Constitution or Federal or State laws.
